[event]
# Teleport to Laurelia
type=on_trigger
location=13,16,2,1
intermap=laurelia.txt,24,92

[event]
# On Ghosts
type=on_trigger
repeat=false
location=6,8,1,1
hotspot=location
msg=p.32: "Ghosts, being incorporeal, are nearly immune to heat and fire."
tooltip=On Ghosts

[event]
# History
type=on_trigger
repeat=false
location=4,11,1,1
hotspot=location
msg=p.1:  "This small town is a seeming backwater.  However, nearly every one of it's citizens has the ability to polymorph into another creature."  Better put it back on the top shelf where the tourists can't find it.
tooltip=History of Laurelia

[event]
# Demonology
type=on_trigger
repeat=false
location=17,11,1,1
hotspot=location
msg=p. 967: "Zalkaz was constantly beset by paladins seeking to destroy him; he would eliminate each one by blotting out the light with hordes of bats."
tooltip=Demonology
